Hra je svižná, chytlavá a nenechá vás si oddychnout.  Při hraní za přeživšiho budete pod nátlakem stresu a strachu zatímco se budete snažit opravit generátory a utéct. Při hraní za jednoho z vrahů se budete muset poprat s úkolem zabití 4 přeživších zatímco si budete užívat rozmanitost jejich schopností jako například pokládání pastí nebo zneviditelnění. 

Hra zatím nabízí 4 typy přeživších a 3 typy vrahů. 
Hra se odehrává ve formátu 4vs1.  
Hra dále nabízí hraní s přáteli ať už se budete snažit je zabít či společně utéct. 

Za 20€ které hra stojí při koupi nabízí skvělou zábavu ať už hrajete sami čí s přáteli ačkoliv pokud hrajete sami může hra začít být pro někoho repetetivní.
I'd rather chizzle away the Plubis and the Grumbo all day long than play this pile of garbage.

Игра в целом хорошая, лично мне она очень понравилась. Я помню, когда  впервые в неё попробовал поиграть это был просто лютый пиздец, я люто обосрался  , увидев маньяка, он взялся не откуда, короче маньяк-невидимка , я его с того самого момента ненавижу всем сердцем , даже когда захожу в лобби и после начинаю играть  и слышу этот звук,того маньяка , я понимаю, что мне пиздец.
Кстати, по поводу лобби , если днём играть , то хуй подключишься , если вечером ну или же ночью играть , тогда нормально  всё будет;  не могу точно так говорить, потому что у кого-то  может все нормально быть с поиском лобби, но лично у меня вот как.
В игре есть несколько видов карт, точно не помню сколько, где-то 3 вроде. Так же игрок может выбрать за кого ему играть, за маньяка или же за выжившего .Присутствуют 3 вида маньяка: невидемый (Банши) , сутулый (Хиллбилли), и такой-качок (Траппер), каждый из этих маньяков по своему особенный . Есть ещё 4-ро выживших, не знаю что про них сказать, в общем две бабы и два мужика. 
Цель игры за выживших запустить определённое число генераторов и выбраться , а если игра за маньяка , сами понимаете - не дать уйти выжившим, убить нах**!!!
Так же  есть система уровней и рангов, ещё присутствуют перки, помогающие вам что-либо лучше делать в игре. Дальше сами поймёте что и как делать.
Можно поиграть вместе с друзьями , поугарать, с друзьями на самом деле веселее играть, чем одному, но есть один большой минус играя с друзьями ,вы не можете прокачиваться , ни ранг , ни уровень , ничего! Но в игре больше плюсов , чем минусов.
В общем рекомендую вам попробовать в неё поиграть)))

Gamebad

Let me tell you a story of a survivor. Spawn in as survivor ridiculously close to the killer. He walks away. I begin working on the generator that I spawned by. I fix the generator and then hide in a nearby closet. The killer searches the closet and violently pulls me from it and takes me down into his sex dungion. I attempt escape after he walks away and am successful. I start running up the stairs and get caught in a bear trap. The killer returns and brings me back down into the sex dungion. I struggle for awhile and then another survivor saves me, we escape, and he heals me. We start looking for another generator. While approaching a generator, I get caught in another bear trap, the guy that helped me before runs away and the killer kidnaps me again. I am quickly hung on another hook and sacrificed. 

Dead By Daylight=10/10 
Will step in more bear traps.

If you like hanging out with your friends

This is the game you've been looking for.

i once played a match as killer where everyone dced immediately cause i was playing spirit which i pyaed like 3 dollars for


10/10 game of the year

Edit: Still fun

I want to thumbs up this game. Its fun solo, it is. If your looking for a solo-multiplayer game thats spooky, buy this game.
BUT, if your like me and my friends, looking for a good 2-3 multiplayer spook fest, avoid this, at least for now. Im writing this at the time the Play with Friends ladder has been RE-RELEASED. It takes roughly 20 minutes of re-quing over and over and over to get into a lobby. And I do mean Re-quing every 3 seconds, so its not like you can even do anything while you wait. It occasionaly does the "Cant find game" thing in solo player also (why?), but its to a forgivable extent.

-TL;DR, wait until you see the "Play With Friends" function working at 100% to buy this, with que times under 20 mins (for JUST 2 people; 3 is unplayable) or buy it on a sale with low expecations.


-Edit-Review: The Game now deserves a thumbs up, for working at its base level. Some killers are much more obnoxious than others (looking at you Doctor) but overall its a fun game.
不错的游戏，就是挂有点的多~
Bugs are progressively worse every DLC, blaring imbalances, and the devs generally seem disconnected with the fans/game itself.

An amazing game, IF you find the right people. Starting the game sometimes as long as the game. The killers quit when they realise that the survivours are way too good. As the killer, too many glitches and power ups in favour of the survivors. As the survivours, the helping part of the game is lost, it becomes every man foe themselves. 

Apart from this, the game is great! When the killer is near, your heart actually starts to beat. The thrill and the risk/reward makes the game motivating and surprisngly fast paced. Matches ususally last 20 mins and they go by fast. 

Recommend if you want a cheap game to enjoy.

O que eu posso dizer desse jogo??
Ele simplesmente pegou algo clichê, e tornou em algo genial, apesar do tema "serial killer" ser algo comum, até então NINGUEM teve a ideia de fazer um jogo desses, é uma formula perfeita para multiplayer.
o jogo no começo é um pouco assustador, como iniciante vc vai levar alguns sustos, mas é coisa leve
Com o tempo o jogo te da uma imersão e vira competitivo.
A variedade de mapas, de sobreviventes,de assassinos, são tudo clichês. MAS ISSO É GENIAL E ÓTIMO
Muitas empresas tentam "inovar" sendo que o clichê 90% das vezes é bom, Mario que eu diga(sempre salva a peach, e o jogo nunca foi ruim com essa formula)
Explicando um pouco do jogo---
Temos 4 sobreviventes, e 3 assassinos, com mais 1 por vir
Quando ganhamos pontos, ´podemos passar de level o nosso personagem. Vale lembrar que cada personagem tem suas propias individualidades. E esse jogo tem uma pegada coop, então se vc é bom, vai querer salvar uma pessoa, e ele te faz sentir na pele a traição, ou ser traido. tipo alguem te salvar e se sacrificar por vc e tu não volta pra salvar, dá um peso na conciencia cara...............
Pros.
-Uma formula clichê e boa
-Uma empresa que até então está bem empenhada
-Um sistema de up que faz o jogo não ficar repetitivo
-Mapas e assassinos que são bem encaixados na historia

Contras.
- Se o host da partida(assassino) a net dele for ruim, VC VAI PASSAR RAIVA!!!
-Tem muitos bugs enquanto vc busca partida, maas eles estão arrumando muitos bugs
-Alguns perks são desbalanceados
-o machranking do jogo é ruim, Digamos que vc é rank 12 lvl 40, VC VAI CAIR COM MUITOS RANK 20 LVL 1!!!!!

Conclusão.
Dead by daylight, é um jogo ótimo, ainda mais pra jogar com amigos em seu time,ou se quer ser o matador, jogue de assassino,apesar dos momentos de raiva, se vc quer um jogo para jogar com amigos, ou jogar umas partidas de 8 a 30 minutos. com perseguição,dibres,se esconder e mais dibres. VALE TOTAL PAGAR 36 REAIS :)

While this is exactly the type of game my friends and I were looking for, it falls way short of the mark. My friends stopped playing after one weekend because of the cons in the following list.

Pros:
High horror/stress aspect 
Fun to play with friends (Unranked Only)

Cons:
-NO PARTY LOBBY!!! ( I know they are working on the issue, but the fact a MULTIPLAYER game released without it is a huge failure on the devs)
-Game HIGHLY favors the survivors (9 out of 10 games end with 1 survivor, 7 out of 10 end with 2 or more surviving)
-Game requires reblancing (Survivor perks quickly overpower even veteran killers)

I will change my recommendation once these issues are resloved.

Unless the window bull is fixed and survivors are either toned down, or killers beefed up, I can not recommend this game.

Купила игру два дня назад, бомбит с игроков, не переставая. Сняла Недомэг с крюка, отхватила люлей, замансила маньяка, убежала в дебри катки, нашла генератор, завела, добежала до хижины, встретила старую знакомую, застряла с ней в проеме. Ни туда, ни сюда. Маньяк как раз шел за ней, а отхватила я. Итого: меня повесили, френеми убежала далеко-далеко чинить генератор (!???), два других дебила попрятались в шкафы. 
Ну и как в этой игре можно заниматься альтруизмом? Давайте, блин, очки лучше за поху***зм. 
Сама игра шикарна, как наркотик. Осталось научиться не отхватывать за других, а этим перком, к сожалению, даже в реальном мире ооочень тяжело овладеть...

Tolles Spiel, läuft endlich ohne lange Warte Zeiten. Was mich jedoch ärgert ist, das meine Survivors und meine Killer zurück auf Null gesetzt wurden. Doch nach anschreiben des Supports, habe ich genügent Blutpunkte bekommen, sodass ich meine Überlebenden und Killer wieder Skillen konnte auf dass Level, wo ich war. Weiss zwar nicht, warum die Entwickler so einen scheiss machen, aber vom Spielsinn her echt klasse. Deswegen Daumen hoch.

Really fuckin' good game. Really addicting and exiting to play.
Almost everything works, but only cons are that its sometimes SO HARD (hehe) to find a lobby. And that when someone heals you you cant escape from them (sometimes some peiple heal u too long and killer gets u).
But other than that? A really good game!

If u're thinkin' on buying this - u really should. It's worth it

Dead by Daylight is a fun game where you can take the role of a killer or survivor. Both roles has their own traits, ups and downs and are entertaining to play. (The game however is still being worked on but the devs are active and give the patches fast :) )

The concept of this game is amazing. The only downside is they sold a game that was advertised as complete which it obviously was not. Also not a huge fan of how lightly the devs are wording their updates with sarcastic remarks. But I do recommend the game but be prepared for a lot of balancing updates..... Killer OP one week then survivors are OP the next. Patience is the key to enjoying this game.
КРУТЬ

This game is really expensive for what you get. It has alot of glitches and I have a hard time joining a game. there is only one game mode and without alot of grinding you wont get the perks that make it easier to survive. Just an idea of what i went through its a little something like this
-It took 3 mins to get into a lobby(
-another 2 mins for the game to actually start
-my health pack that i equipped (that are consumed if you die btw) to glitch up in game and be unable to use
-get caught (that was my fault)
-get rescued only to be stuck in place in a weird first person view
-then to be repeatly be  hit by the killer because he also couldnt figure out what was going on
-then be forced to quit because me and the killer would have been there for ever
I know that this guys are indie but i was at least a little bit of polish to this game since they are asking for 20 dollars i actually haven been this mad since battlefield 4 had me stuck on their "press start" menu. but it might just be me haveing the worst luck ever because everyone seems to love this game.

This game is incredibly glitchy. I had to leave a match as a killer because a survivor manage to glitch into a meathook post, and refused to quit the game. In another instance, I played as a survivor and got stuck in a magic mime box at the bottom of a hill. Later the killer got stuck in that same box and we won the game with no deaths and no worries. The dev's really need to go through and fix issues with the game BEFORE they release it. So, until they do what they should have done MONTHS AGO, don't buy their product.

Edit:
All if not most of the bugs that existed when this game was released has been patched, and the developers are incredibly customer-focused and frequently release patches and tweak the game. Recently, they released a patch that fixed severe mathcmaking issues, making the game hundreds of times more playable. They listened to the concerns of the public, and addressed them. While I stand by my statement that these bugs should have been fixed before the release of the game, they are fixed now. While it took time for the game to be user-friendly and playable, it now is. If you're interested, go for it. Add to cart.

Second Edit:
Wow. After the release of the HALLOWEEN dlc, this game went from playable to frustrating in about ten seconds. The community has just become incredibly more hostile, and the game mechanics are all shot to hell. I/ll be back IF it's fixed.

AS OF NOW!: Bought into the Hype. Took 10min to join a  game. Then couldn't play it cause of the major LAG!

As of now (month into release) the game is still broken, laggy and looong wait lines. Killer camps around the hooked victims, so there's no incentive to even risk your life for theirs.

Survivors have no choice but to loop, resulting in the killer becoming frustrated n quit :)

Im SURE the game will be addressed but not worth the $20 investment just to wait for them to eventually fix the issues it currently has.

Dude, can you guys please fix being punished if people quit. Especially if the killer quits. It absolutely blows when you lose PiP just because the killer is being a baby. Not to mention it doesnt punish the quitter at all. Thanks for fixing a lot of the glitches but the gameplay and lobbying needs some work. I know you guys are working on content but damn man. That punishment is killing this game for me.

5 лет игре, а тебя всё ещё бьёт через окно. Ладно когда модель уже перелезла, но хитбоксы всё ещё засчитываются, ведь само действие ещё не закончено и ты не управляешь персонажем. Условности, окей. Но когда ты действие реально закончилось, ты успел сделать пару шагов, а тебя всё равно бьют через окно - это дно.

When you gotta release that inner child in you and play adult hide and go seek. This is that game for you. With a hautning atmosphere that sends you chills when you are repairing the generators to escape... or if you think you can catch everyone within the walls and hang them on hooks to your delight. Then this game is for you. Either be scared or be the one that scares, it is all entirely up to you.

The worst game ever created. Everything in this game is broken and is more frustrating than horror. Bugs everywhere, you have to wait 10 minutes until you find a game with survive with friends. DO NOT BUY THIS GAME!

EDIT 21.08.2016: Started playing again since they fixed Survive With Friends. Quiting again after 5 frustrating matches.
Bewegt sich langsam auf eine gute Balance zu, aber diese Bugs....

Seit dem 14. Juni 2016 haben wir Spaß daran, getötet zu werden und zu töten. 
Warum also, passe ich mein Review an? Ganz einfach!
Es war nie Early Access, war aber anfangs eher wie eine buggy Demo. 
Da entstand schon der Spaß mit "#Vollversion" und so weiter.
Aber nach über einem Jahr, hat sich noch nichts getan.
Es gibt immer noch mehr Bugs, als neue Features, die auch funktionieren.
Intern kann man sich Dead by Daylight ruhig mal geben, aber da hört der Spaß auch auf.
Mittlerweile muss man halbwegs campen als Killer, um die Chance auf einen Pip zu haben.
Nice Patch, DbD. Paar Skills funktionieren einfach mal nicht richtig und so weiter....
Das Frust Level ist mittlerweile einfach so hoch, bei diesem GLANZVOLLEN Spiel.
Wollte mich nochmal ransetzen und Rank 1 machen... aber... nein danke, ich kann Lebenszeit auch anders das Klo runterspülen.
#SaltyReview <--- Das erwartet Euch, wenn Ihr Euch auf DbD einlasst.

Edit: Spielstand der Freundin hat sich irgendwieeee~ zurückgesetzt. Locker 20 Millionen ( wenn nicht mehr ) Blutpunkte weg und mehrere hundert Stunden für die Katz.
Was macht der Support? Gar nichts. Er antwortet nicht mal.
Man soll manuell seinen Speicherstand ab und zu sichern, für den Fall, dass das passieren kann. Aber mal im Ernst... stell dir vor die spielst seit jahren WoW und bist auf ein mal wieder Level 1? Die Devs hinter DbD sind unfassbar. Mittlerweile zahlt man über 60€ für DbD mit allen DLCs und Support, Fortschritt & Sicherheit gibt es nicht.

(Je modifie mon évalutaiton pour refléter l'évolution du jeu depuis sa sortie)

Il fait partie de mes jeux "Coup de Coeur" et  a connu, en plus d'un an, une évolution extraordinaire avec des DLC d'exceptions et des MAJs mettant en place de nouvelles choses ou en réparant les bugs

Entre amis ou avec le monde entier, essayez de survivre ou de pourchassez vos proies, Dead by Daylight vous offrira une expérience de jeu vraiment intéressante et sympa. Les pro-gamers ou les casuals y trouveront leur bonheur. Chaque survivant apportera de précieuses compétences tout comme les tueurs qui ont leurs particularités pour tuer.

Après avoir fait une vidéo découverte, il y a un an, je vous propose une série de Best-of sur ma chaine Youtube avec ce premier épisode : https://youtu.be/mppc12Z-iH4

Still a fun game if played with friends. DBD can occasionally be an endless source of frustration -- again, mitigated somewhat by playing with friends. Stay away if your are frustrated easily and a sore loser. Also, at this point the game is a giant grind with no relief in sight. "Blood points" are earned during matches as either survivor or killer during matches. These blood points are used in a blood web to buy perks (think special passive or active abilities) or items. Each individual character has three "teachable perks" unique to them that can be unlocked via blood points at levels 30, 35, and 40. There are 27 survivors in the game... so 81 teachable perks... ouch. That doesn't even take into account killers and their perks (same system and currency). So yeah, huge grind. Hopefully devs will make some accommodation in the near future to shrink the grind.

Where is "EARLY ACCESS" sign? Ohh.. this is a complete real deal ?! Really?!!! Like --- it's done???

Sorry but the game is such incomplete piece of crap I still can't believe how disappointed I am. Because I loved the idea. OK here is why:

CONS: 
- Repetitive (as hell) game design and everything in it - every map has the same feeling, goal and atmosphere (it's fun for 2 rounds) --- I was looking forward to run through beautifly designed levels like some cabins / cottage with forests around, and LAKE omg, the typical horror scenery... no, I got repetitive piles of walls and crap and few trees like I wanna play Paintball or what?!!...
- Customization option is useless - you cannot change anything on your Hunter character at all (NOT EVEN weapon or overall look). With survivors, you can change 2 (!!!) damn kind of jeans and 1(!!!!!!) mustache (really, in 2016?!) WOW! 
- Overall graphics is not bad, but animations and physics looks like 2000's - feels awfuly skeletal the whole movement system
- Leveling system is not enough motivating 
- Matchmaking is useless (you get 20-30 lvl oponent while you're 4) and it's even not functional most of the time. I got so much disconnections from lobby I can't even count it.

PROS:
- One of a kind game (for now, that's big advantage for developers)
- Unique idea for a game

OVERALL:
- I hope developers won't fall asleep and bring better features and gaming experience in the future. Or please, somebody else, make perfect horror hunting game like this, but better way :-)

First off I will say as on 15-Jul-16 I would not purchase this game unless you have patience. But let me expand on that.

This game is overall fantastic. It has a great concept and its mechanics are pretty good. The audio brings suspence and the models of the characters are amazing. 

However the issues are the glitches/servers.

As of late with alot of maintenence to add party mode (Essentially you have to luck out on connecting with friends, you can't invite them without it being a private match) this game has become unplayable (unless you're lucky enough to get into a match). Now don't be disheartened by this. The developers are constantly giving updates which is a good, and majority of the time this game is functional. I would personally suggest buying this either when its on special or a week or two from now. 

Overall I give this game a solid 8/10.
It does bring the horror element without it being completely scary depending on your play style. 
For myself I usually pop out brick when playing horror games, except for this game which still keeps me on the edge of my seat, allows me to actually enjoy the horror aspect of it. 

Hopefully this review has helped :)

Режим игры 4 против 1. Если кратко: четыре человека со своими особыми способностями, попавшие по различным стечениям обстоятельств в некое, никому из них неизвестное, пугающее место и должны сплотиться с целью приложить все усилия для включения неких генераторов (двигателей) что бы дать достаточное количество электричества  для открытия ворот к спасению.
Однако, все не так просто. Спустя пару, а может и меньше минут они замечают пятого участника. Странное ощущение...сердце начинает настараживающе биться. Что происходит?! Он приближается и напряжение лишь нарастает. От страха выживающие бегут в разные стороны и, казалось бы от командного духа не осталось ни следа.. один из бегущих попадает в медвежий капкан и крик разносится во все стороны. Может быть кто-нибудь ему поможет?! Но нет. Все лишь беспокоятся о своих шкурах. 
Тот самый "пятый" неспешно подходит к жертве, попавшейся в ловушку, стонущей от невыносимой боли. В залитых кровью от боли глазах виден ужас и отражение массивной фигуры, которая наклоняется и всбрасывает попавшегося на плечо. 
В голове кроме боли появляется мысль:"Почему он меня не убил? Куда он меня несет?!". 
Через несколько мгновений остальные сбежавшие слышат пронзительный крик, который вынуждает их бежать еще дальше. 
Но лишь спустя некоторое время они понимают что они попали в западню из которой нет выхода. Механические ворота - закрыты. Вокруг лишь стены и странные столбы, с которых свисают окровавленные крюки.
Почти отчаявшись один из них видет какое-то механическое устройство похожее на двигатель... попытка включить устройство. Неудача. Необходимо починить. 
Как только неполадка была устранена, загорелся свет. Теперь все поняли, что необходимо найти другие и включить их. Возможно чем-то это поможет...
Собственно, возможно я смог донести до вас смысл этой игры, которая восхитила меня своей атмосферностью и, взаправду, смогла меня напугать. 
Есть некоторые недостатки, такие как: выбрасывает из лобби при создании игры, иногда пропадают текстуры. И все же, это мелочи жизни, которые, как мне кажется устранятся в ближайших патчах. Кстати, только вчера вышел новый патч, в котором, теперь вы с друзьями сможете показать высокий уровень сплоченности для спасения ваших жизней.
Спасибо всем кто осилил столько много букв. Приятной игры!:)

If you're not sure about buying this quite yet because of how similar it looks to the upcoming Friday the 13th videogame, I know exactly how you feel. Because of games like Infestation: Survivor Stories, I've been wary of developers looking for a quick cashgrab and shitting out an unfinished/general crap game--in Infestation's case, DayZ Standalone was what they were trying to emulate. However, Dead by Daylight is it's own kind of monster, literally. 
Teamwork is rewarded, helping others is rewarded, and surviving is rewarded. But killing and brutalizing is also rewarded in the case of the player-controlled killer. Both sides are very quite fun, especially with the newly released "survive with friends" which now allows you to invite the friends you'd like to play with.
For a little over 20 dollars Canadian (I got it while on sale for my buddy and myself), it's hard to be disapointed with this game.
